include(apps_lib_common)
include(apps_svc_common)
include(apps_sub_cfg)
include(apps_subcommon)
include(apps_feature_macro)

list(APPEND TEE_C_SOURCES
    src/sec_flash_ext_api.c
)

list(APPEND TEE_C_FLAGS
    -fno-builtin
)

tee_add_library(sec_flash_client STATIC
    SOURCES
    ${TEE_C_SOURCES}

    COMPILE_TOOL
    clang

    COMPILER_FLAGS
    ${TEE_C_FLAGS}

    COMPILER_DEFINITIONS
    ${TEE_C_DEFINITIONS}

    PRIVATE_INCLUDES
    ${TEE_INCLUDE_PATH}

    NO_INSTALL
)
